Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacteria:Aerococcus viridans (MIC=20-40 µM), Micrococcus luteus (MIC=20-40 µM), Bacillus megaterium (MIC=20-40 µM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry

Literature.Title: Structure-activity analysis of thanatin, a 21-residue inducible insect defense peptide with sequence homology to frog skin antimicrobial peptides.
Literature.Reference: Proc Natl Acad Sci U S A. 1996 Feb 6;93(3)1221-1225.
Literature.Author: Fehlbaum P, Bulet P, Chernysh S, Briand JP, Roussel JP, Letellier L, Hetru C, Hoffmann JA.
